channel.title: Bank not saving?
channel.description: So i'm using Epicurus as a base for the server I am working on and I'm wandering why every time I log-in my bank is empty. I searched through the PlayerSave file and it does have a procedure to save the bank items to the character file, but yet it doesn't? Anyone else have this problem with this source?

item.title: Bank not saving?
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

So i’m using Epicurus as a base for the server I am working on and I’m wandering why every time I log-in my bank is empty. I searched through the PlayerSave file and it does have a procedure to save the bank items to the character file, but yet it doesn’t? Anyone else have this problem with this source?
